DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine effect ISIS 113715 monotherapy insulin sensitivity , glucose lipid metabolism energy expenditure subject type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Effects ISIS 113715 Insulin Sensitivity , Glucose , Lipid Metabolism Energy Expenditure Type 2 Diabetics
DOC.criteria: Male female ( post menopausal and/or surgically sterile ) Aged 18 70 year Treatment na√Øve subject fast blood glucose level 150220 mg/dL , hematocrit > /= 35 % HbA1c level > /= 7 % < /= 10.0 % Subjects antidiabetic therapy fast blood glucose level 100200 mg/dL , hematocrit > /= 35 % , HbA1c level > /= 6.5 % < /= 9.0 % Greater 3 severe hypoglycemic episode within six month screen Pregnant , breastfeeding , intend become pregnant Clinical sign symptom liver disease , acute chronic hepatitis , ALT great 1.5 time upper limit normal History hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody , HIV Complications diabetes ( e.g. , neuropathy , nephropathy , retinopathy ) Clinically significant currently active disease Clinically significant abnormality medical history , physical examination , laboratory examination
